hero.title: Track Calories
hero.description: Hey there! Meet Slice ‚Äì your friendly AI companion that makes calorie tracking super easy and fun! üì∏ Just snap a quick photo of your meal or scan a barcode, and voil√†! You'll instantly get all the calories, nutrients, and personalized tips you need. We'll keep you motivated with gentle reminders, so you can reach your health goals without any stress! üí™‚ú®

howItWorks.title: How Does Slice Work?
howItWorks.description: It's incredibly simple! üòä Just take a quick photo of your food, and Slice does all the magic! Our smart AI uses your phone's camera to understand exactly what you're eating and how much. We've trained it on thousands of delicious meals, so it knows the difference between a slice of pizza and a salad! üçïü•ó Then, like a friendly nutritionist, it tells you everything you need to know: calories, protein, carbs, fat, and more!

accuracy.title: How Accurate Is Slice?
accuracy.description: Great question! Slice is super accurate ‚Äì about 90% of the time! üéØ Sure, when you have a super complex meal with tons of ingredients, it might need a tiny bit of help, but that's totally okay! You can always use our friendly "Describe" feature or scan barcodes for packaged foods. And if something doesn't look quite right? Just tap "Fix results" and help us learn! We love getting better! üíï

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At Slice, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information. By using our services, you agree to this policy.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect the following information from you:

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.content: We use your information for the following purposes:
dataUsage.provideService: Providing calorie tracking and nutrition services
dataUsage.improveAccuracy: Improving AI accuracy in food recognition
dataUsage.support: Providing technical support and answering questions

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not share your information with third parties, except in the following cases:
dataSharing.serviceProviders: Trusted service providers (such as secure cloud services)
dataSharing.legalRequirements: When required by law or requested by competent authorities
dataSharing.businessTransfer: In case of business transfer or company merger

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We use strong security measures to protect your information:
dataSecurity.encryption: Encryption of sensitive data during transmission and storage
dataSecurity.accessControl: Limited access control to personal information
dataSecurity.regularAudits: Regular security audits and system updates

userRights.title: User Rights
userRights.content: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:
userRights.correction: Correction of incorrect or incomplete information
userRights.deletion: Deletion of personal information (right to be forgotten)
userRights.portability: Receiving a copy of information in readable format
userRights.objection: Objection to processing information for specific purposes

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your information only as long as necessary to provide services. Inactive account information is deleted after 3 years. Your nutrition and health information is retained as long as your account is active to provide personalized services.

children.title: Children
children.content: Our services are designed for people over 13 years old. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we discover that we have collected information from a child under 13, we will delete it immediately.

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy. Significant changes will be notified through app notifications or email. Continued use of services after changes means you agree to the new policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this privacy policy or want to exercise your rights, please contact us:

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Slice. By using our website and mobile application, you agree to these terms of use. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use our services.

usageLicense.title: Use License
usageLicense.content: Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials (information or software) on the Slice app for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title.
usageLicense.modify: Under this license you may not modify or copy the materials.
usageLicense.commercial: Use the materials for any commercial purpose, or for any public display (commercial or non-commercial).
usageLicense.reverseEngineer: Attempt to decompile or reverse engineer any software contained on the Slice app.
usageLicense.copyright: Remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials.
usageLicense.transfer: Transfer the materials to another person or 'mirror' the materials on any other server.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The materials on the Slice app are provided on an 'as is' basis. Slice makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.
disclaimer.medical: The content provided by Slice is for informational purposes only and is not intended as medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition.

limitations.title: Limitations
limitations.content: In no event shall Slice or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on the Slice app, even if Slice or a Slice authorized representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage.

accuracy.title: Accuracy of Materials
accuracy.content: The materials appearing on the Slice app could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. Slice does not warrant that any of the materials on its app are accurate, complete, or current. Slice may make changes to the materials contained on its app at any time without notice. However, Slice does not make any commitment to update the materials.

links.title: Links
links.content: Slice has not reviewed all of the sites linked to its app and is not responsible for the contents of any such linked site. The inclusion of any link does not imply endorsement by Slice of the site. Use of any such linked website is at the user's own risk.

modifications.title: Modifications
modifications.content: Slice may revise these terms of use for its app at any time without notice. By using this app you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these terms of use.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Iran and you irrevocably submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that State or location.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Use, please contact us.
